full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/7/2023 UNI STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUST E IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE MEMORANDUM OF CREATION OF RECORD OF LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE PLACE: MIAMI, FL I-94 NUMBER: 42896818300 FILE NUMBER: A75 424 782 STATUS AS A LAWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES IS ACCORDED: NAME: MARIE ANNA BRICE SEX: F CARE OF : BIRTH DATE: 07/25/05 ADDRESS: 160 NE. 86TH ST COUNTRY OF BIRTH: HAITI MIAMI, FL 33138 NATIONALITY: HAITI CITY OF BIRTH: SAINT-LOUIS COUNTRY OF LAST RESIDENCE: HAITI MARITAL STATUS: MARRIED OCCUPATION: LAB N.I. CLASS AT TIME OF ADJ: B-2 PREFERENCE (IF ANY) YEAR OF N.I. CLASS: 87 PRIORITY DATE: N/A COUNTRY OF TO WHICH CHARGEABLE: N/A LABOR CERTIFICATION: N (FIRST NAME ) MOTHER: SOPHIE FATHER: TIMOLEON LAST NIV ISSUED AT: PORT-AU-PRINCE LAST NIV CLASS: B-2 DATE NIV ISSUED: / / LAST NIV NUMBER: - UNDER THE FOLLOWING PROVISION OF LAW: SECTION 245 OF THE I & N ACT AS 07 31 1997 OF : PORT OF ENTRY: MIA CLASS OF ADMISSION: IRO REMARKS: RECOMMENDED BY: (IMMIGRATION OFFICER) MAKGINI PHARKE DATE OF ACTION DATE: 07/31/1992 APPROVED I.N.S.
